author: web007
title: Great build! Epic castle and design.
review:
Over 2000 pieces, with 500 unique ones. What an epic build. Castle is one of my all time favorite themes. 

Started on a Saturday...finished late Sunday. Had lots of distractions (2 yr old wanted in on the build, but he only likes to destroy). 

Mini figures are pretty plane.

Details of the castle are really creative and thought through. I had a hard time keeping the last tower together while building the set, but I found a way to overcome and get it solidified.

I hope to see this set in Mass production and I wish I would of bought some of the other sets fans created!

Hope y'all enjoy it as much as me!
